de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller

Class RefereeCommunicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.RefereeCommunicationController

  • public class RefereeCommunicationController
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller for the referee communication scene.

    Legal stuff

      • sendEMails

        private void sendEMails(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> theDocData,
                        Configuration theConfig)

        Sends mails.

        Every mail is sent individually for two reasons:

        1. If there are multiple recipients, Transport#send(Message, String, String) sends all mails in a transaction, meaning if one fails, all fail. This is bad, because mails frequently fail, meaning one has to resend all Mails.

        Maybe I’m doing something wrong there, in that case the code could be changes to including all recipients as BCC.

        1. I have to use individualized mails (per template), this only works with individual mails.
        Parameters:
        theDocData - document data
        theConfig - template configuration

      • showAttachmentEditDialog

        private boolean showAttachmentEditDialog(Attachment theAttachment)

        Opens the attachment edit dialog.

        Parameters:
        theAttachment - the attachment to be edited
        Returns:
        true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise.
